summary.span: 同步光标和用户界面。

span.span: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可能需要查找光标所在位置的元素。Applications may need to locate the element that the cursor is positioned over. 如果应用程序使用动画，则该方法可能会返回从光标下移出的元素。If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. 调用 以 确保返回正确的元素。Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何返回光标下的元素。The following example demonstrates how to return an element that is under the cursor. 调用 可确保返回正确的元素。Calling ensures that returns the correct element.
